About me


I am a finnish student of software engineering in Helsinki Metropolia AMK. I started my studies in 2012. My origins are in Lohja and I currently live in Espoo.

Languages and methods I mainly have experience in:

  • Java
  • C/C++
  • JavaScript
  • XML/Json
  • Concurrency
  • Server software (mainly practiced with Java)
  • MVC

I am also interested in modern web technology related tools and frameworks like AngularJS, Yeoman, Grunt, Html5 and Css3 to name a few.

My likes list in project cycles:

  • Frameworks
  • Agility
  • Trying out new things

I like to play video-, card- and boardgames on my spare time and play some guitar or bass.
